overview: Girl Candy Films presents the second volume of Nica Noelle's kissing-themed series, with an emphasis on deep, passionate soul-kissing, lip biting, tongue sucking and neck nibbling. As these lustful lesbians bring each other to orgasm after passionate orgasm, their kisses become deeper and more intense, and you will feel as if you're right on the bed with them.
title: Deep Kissing Lesbians 2
